Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cornell Drive
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temp. rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and DuSable Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near 47th/Cornell Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and DuSable Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near 47th/Cornell Drive.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at/Midway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at/Midway.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service. Shuttles buses haven been requested from Midway to Western to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Rockwell
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Rockwell due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Rockwell due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Kimball to Southport to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Oakton
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing in both directions due to fire department activity near Oakton. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing in both directions due to fire department activity near Oakton. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
